original_text: About eight days after Jesus said this, he took Peter, John and James with him and went up onto a mountain to pray.
korean_text: 이 말씀을 하신 후 팔 일쯤 되어 예수께서 베드로와 요한과 야고보를 데리고 기도하시러 산에 올라가사

sentences.original_text: About eight days after Jesus said this
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 이 말씀을 하신 지 약 8일 후에

sentences.original_text: he took Peter, John and James with him
and went up onto a mountain to pray
